thread.title: EMS Find's Medical Transportation App is Available for Download From the App Store
thread.title_full: EMS Find's Medical Transportation App is Available for Download From the App Store - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: EMS Find's Medical Transportation App is Available for Download From the App Store
text:
EMS Find, Inc.
PHILADELPHIA , Oct. 2, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- EMS Find, Inc. (OTCQB: EMSF), the developer of on-demand medical transportation solutions is pleased to announce that the EMS Find iOS App has been approved by Apple for release and will be available for the free download on the App Store immediately.
"I'm extremely impressed by the results of our development team and I hope to set a firm launch date in the near future," says EMS Find's CEO, Steve Rubakh . "Our team is dedicated to the development of this patent pending technology that will enable health care providers and patients to smartly and efficiently schedule and track medical transports, resulting in better health care for the patients. Potential investors, shareholders, health care providers, transportation companies and general public will benefit from using EMS Find App, designed to deliver a significant market efficiencies, similar to the way Uber had reshaped the taxi industry."
About App: EMS Find App is a cloud-based on-demand platform used with smartphones and web technologies to offer optimal booking, scheduling and dispatching for non-emergent medical transports. It connects the health care providers and patients with networks of medical transport companies to schedule medical transportation in a timely and efficient way, based on the type of medical transportation that fits patients' needs. Users can easily find near by transportation providers, place requests for transport based on patients' insurance coverage and medical requirements, and track ambulances in real time.
EMS Find App optimizes scheduling process by taking into account the patient's transport requirements such as ALS, BLS, Wheelchair or Taxi, pick-up and appointment time, distance and trip time.
It creates a very efficient way to relay patient related information from health care providers to transportation companies in order to schedule a medical transport. It reduces time spent on phones along with the elimination of faxing documents. It provides a smart solution to schedule transports which result in an improved bed turnover and a reduction of the discharge time. About EMS Find:
EMS Find, Inc. develops and markets B2B & B2C on-demand mobile platform, designed to connect health care providers and consumers to the network of medical transport companies throughout the United States and Canada . The platform enables users (hospitals, medical offices, dialysis centers, nursing homes, home care agencies and other medical providers) and the public to schedule medical transportation in a timely and efficient way based on the type of medical transportation which best fits each patients' needs. The EMS Find app works on any smart device including smart phones, tablets or laptops. iOS, Android and Desktop versions will allow users to connect in real time to local and near by medical transportation companies wherever the medical transports are needed and fit the medical, logistical and financial criteria.
www.emsfind.com
